titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Chancellor of the University of Pittsburgh, David H. Kurtzman (Acting), Administrative Files, 1966-1967 UA.2.10.1966-1967
titlestmt.author: Marianne Kasica.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-07-19 07:56:24 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

change.item: Revisions were made to this finding aid in July 2022 to address offensive, harmful, racist, or misrepresentative language.

did.unittitle: Chancellor of the University of Pittsburgh, David H. Kurtzman (Acting), Administrative Files
did.abstract:
CONTENT WARNING -- This finding aid contains records that have been identified as including offensive, harmful, racist, or misrepresentative creator supplied language. In keeping with archival best practice, this language has been retained to preserve the context of the records. In keeping but acknowledging this language, A&SC hopes to encourage critical assessment and questioning of historical materials. Researchers should bear this in mind when accessing
Administrative files of Acting University of Pittsburgh Chancellor David H. Kurtzman, 1966-1967.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These files were deposited at the archives by the Chancellor's office on December 3, 1968.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: All rights reserved. University of Pittsburgh.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: Chancellor of the University of Pittsburgh, David H. Kurtzman (Acting), Administrative Files, 1966-1967, UA.2.10.1966-1967, University Archives, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Chancellor of the University of Pittsburgh, David H. Kurtzman (Acting), Administrative Files, 1966-1967, UA.2.10.1966-1967, University Archives, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Dr. David H. Kurtzman came to the University of Pittsburgh as its Vice Chancellor for Finance in July of 1965. He assumed his new duties at the height of a financial crisis at the University. Seven months later, the institution faced another crisis, the death of Acting Chancellor Stanton C. Crawford in 1966. Dr. Kurtzman was asked to serve as the Chancellor until the University named a permanent Chancellor. In his capacity as Acting Chancellor, Kurtzman guided the University through the transition to a state-related institution.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was inventoried by Archives Service Center staff at the time of donation and was entered into Archivists' Toolkit by Marianne Kasica in 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: These are the administrative files of Acting Chancellor David H. Kurtzman, who assumed the position of Chancellor upon the death of Stanton C. Crawford. This collection includes the documentation of the University's transition to a state-related institution. Kurtzman served as acting chancellor from January 1966 through May 30, 1967. Wesley W. Posvar was appointed Chancellor on June 1, 1967.
